name: Premium SEO Pack – WP SEO Plugin
author: WP SEO - Calin Vingan

sections.description:
Premium SEO Pack is a WordPress SEO Plugin and helps you increase the SEO value for all your pages, decide how you want them to look like on search engine results, and let’s not forget about social media.

We all like being in control, especially when it comes to our website.

Now, Premium SEO Pack gives you the control you’ve wanted all along. You can now increase the WordPress SEO value for all your pages, decide how you want them to look like on search engine results, and let’s not forget about social media.

The plugin is FREE and has all the main On-page SEO options.

Please translate it in your language: Translate Premium SEO Pack

Features:

  • SEO Patterns for each Post Type and Custom Post Types
  • Title, Description, Keywords, Canonical Metas
  • Open Graph Image, Title, Description, Type
  • Twitter Card Image, Title, Description
  • Noindex and Nofollow options for each post type
  • You can customize each page directly from post preview top bar or from admin top bar
  • Works well with Woocommerce and other e-commerce plugins
  • Works with WordPress Multisite

For more SEO features we recommend: Squirrly SEO Plugin
sections.installation:
1. Log In as an Admin on your WordPress blog.
  2. In the menu displayed on the left, there is a “Plugins” tab. Click it.
  3. Now click “Add New”.
  4. There, you have the buttons: “Search | Upload | Featured | Popular | Newest”. Click “Upload”.
  5. Upload the premium-seo-pack.zip file.
  6. After the upload is finished, click Activate Plugin.
  7. Done. In a few minutes you will receive updates for the latest posts.
  8. Enjoy Premium SEO Pack – WordPress SEO Plugin
sections.faq:
Is the product free?

Yes, the product is free with all the present and future features.

You do not offer premium support for Premium SEO Pack – WordPress SEO Plugin
If you want premium support you need a PRO version of Squirrly SEO Plugin

Do you offer WordPress SEO support?

You do not offer premium support for Premium SEO Pack
If you want premium support you need a PRO version of Squirrly SEO Plugin
sections.changelog:
1.6.001

  • Compatibility with WordPress 6.6 & PHP 8.3
  • Update the plugin security and functions

1.5.000

  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 6.2
  • Removed services that are not used anymore
  • Fixed small bugs

1.4.007

  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 5.6.2
  • Update the memory limit check
  • Update the last WordPress requirements

1.4.006

  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 5.5

1.4.005

  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 5.4
  • Fixed and updated the SEO requirements

1.4.004

  • Updated the JSON-LD for the last version of Woocommerce
  • Fixed Open Graph for Products
  • Added the option in Json-LD to remove other JSON-LD metas
  • SEO META updates for 2020

1.4.002

  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 5.3.2

1.4.001

  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 5.2.1

  • Updated on-page SEO for Facebook and Google

1.2.009

  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 4.9.8
  • Fixed the signup process for some domains

1.2.008

  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 4.9.7
  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with Gutenberg Plugin

1.2.007

  • Changed the SimpleXML config to Json to avoid php errors
  • Update Google SEO snippet
  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 4.9.6

1.2.006

  • Updated the new Google limits in Meta Description
  • Fixed the encoded separator in patterns
  • Don’t show Custom SEO when people have no writes or for admin pages
  • Premium SEO Pack is compatible with WordPress 4.9.4

1.2.005

  • Fixed The page at ‘https://www.buyatestkit.com/products/10-panel-dip-drug-test-kit/’ was loaded over HTTPS, but requested an insecure stylesheet ‘http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,700italic,300,400,700’.
  • Compatible with WP 4.8.1

1.2.004

  • Fixed CSS compatibilities in admin frontend
  • Updated the Json-LD with the latest requests
  • Premium SEO Pack works well with the last version of WordPress SEO 4.8

1.2.003

  • Added Facebook Author Link Option for each article
  • Fixed the Facebook Admin IDs
  • Premium SEO Pack works well with the last version of WordPress SEO 4.7.5

1.2.002

  • Import SEO from other WordPress SEO plugins like Yoast SEO, All in one SEO Pack, JetPack, Squirrly SEO, end more
  • Import the Social settings
  • Added custom Post Types with custom SEO Patterns
  • Added the Json-LD Meta
  • Added the Facebook Pixel Tracking
  • Added the Google Analytics Tracking
  • Added the Facebook Publisher Meta
  • Move Custom SEO in Meta Box when edit a post
  • Premium SEO Pack works well with the last version of WordPress SEO 4.7.4

1.2.001

  • Fixed the Unexpected ‘[‘ error from FrontMenu
  • Compatible with WordPress SEO by Yoast
